Title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop –  Add a Loop Workspace to your Teams Channel
Description: Channels in Microsoft Teams streamline collaboration by bringing people, content, and apps together and helping to organize them by project or topic. You will be able to add a Loop workspace tab to standard channels enabling your team to brainstorm, co-create, collect, and organize content—together in real-time.
